SELECT bno, id, title, sdate, click, cnt FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno, bno, id, title, sdate, click, cnt FROM ( SELECT bno, id, title, TO_CHAR(wdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') sdate, click, cnt FROM board, member, ( SELECT bno fbno, NVL(COUNT(fno), 0) cnt FROM board, fileinfo WHERE bno = fbno(+) GROUP BY bno ) WHERE bno = fbno AND bmno = mno AND board.isshow = 'Y' ORDER BY bno DESC ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startCont} AND #{endCont}
SELECT bno, id, title, body, wdate FROM board b, member m WHERE bmno = mno AND b.isshow = 'Y' AND bno = #{bno}
SELECT savename, dir FROM fileinfo WHERE isshow = 'Y' AND fbno = #{bno}
